name: tollcrypt
description: TollCrypt - Blockchain-based automated toll collection system with privacy-preserving authentication

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:hardware"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../contracts && npm install && cd ../hardware && pip install -r requirements.txt

author: TollCrypt Team
